paper_abstract: Motivated by some functional models arising in fuzzy logic, when classical boolean relations between sets are generalized, we study the functional equation S(S(x,y), T(x,y)) = S(x,y), where S is a continuous t-conorm and T is a continuous t-norm. Some interesting methods for solving this type of equations are introduced.
paper_title: On the law S(S(x, y), T(x, y)) = S(x, y) of fuzzy logic
